questions.question: What is technical SEO and why is it important?
questions.answer: Technical SEO refers to optimizing your website's technical infrastructure to help search engines crawl, index, and understand your content more effectively. It's crucial for improving search rankings and user experience.

questions.question: How long does it take to see results from technical SEO improvements?
questions.answer: Technical SEO improvements can show results within 2-6 months, depending on the complexity of issues and how quickly search engines re-crawl your site. Some changes like page speed improvements may show immediate benefits.

questions.question: What technical SEO issues are most common?
questions.answer: Common issues include slow page load times, mobile responsiveness problems, crawl errors, duplicate content, missing meta tags, and poor site architecture.

questions.question: Do you work with all types of websites?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with various platforms including WordPress, Shopify, custom-built sites, and modern frameworks like Astro, Next.js, and React.

questions.question: What's included in your SEO audit?
questions.answer: Our comprehensive SEO audit includes technical analysis, on-page optimization review, site architecture assessment, performance analysis, and actionable recommendations with priority rankings.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after implementation?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various support packages including monthly monitoring, quarterly reviews, and ongoing optimization to ensure your site maintains peak performance.

questions.question: How do you price your services?
questions.answer: Our pricing is based on the scope of work, site complexity, and timeline requirements. We offer both project-based and retainer options to fit different business needs.

questions.question: What's your typical project timeline?
questions.answer: Most technical SEO projects take 4-12 weeks depending on complexity. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation phase.

questions.question: Do you offer guarantees on rankings?
questions.answer: While we can't guarantee specific rankings (no legitimate SEO company can), we do guarantee improvements in technical performance metrics and provide detailed reporting on progress.
